description: An AI document extraction & content analysis platform that transforms unstructured files (PDFs, images, URLs, etc.) into structured data.

actions.name: extract_file_data
actions.description: Upload a file and immediately receive extracted content

actions.name: get_extraction_results
actions.description: Fetches successful data from extraction. Note: The API recommends a 2-second delay between requests to avoid rate-limiting.

triggers.name: extraction_failed
triggers.description: Triggers when a document extraction fails.

triggers.name: new_document_processed
triggers.description: Triggers when a document extraction is successfully processed.
